LocaleResource.Name: AdminInstruction
LocaleResource.Value:
Google Analytics is a free website stats tool from Google. It keeps track of statistics about the visitors and ecommerce conversion on your website.

Follow the next steps to enable Google Analytics integration:

  • Create a Google Analytics account and follow the wizard to add your website
  • Copy the Google Analytics ID into the 'ID' box below
  • Copy the tracking code from Google Analytics into the 'Tracking Code' box below
  • Click the 'Save' button below and Google Analytics will be integrated into your store

LocaleResource.Name: TrackingScript.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Paste the tracking code generated by Google Analytics here. {GOOGLEID} and {ECOMMERCE} will be dynamically replaced.

LocaleResource.Name: EcommerceScript.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Paste the tracking code generated by Google analytics here. {ORDERID}, {SITE}, {TOTAL}, {TAX}, {SHIP}, {CITY}, {STATEPROVINCE}, {COUNTRY}, {DETAILS} will be dynamically replaced.

LocaleResource.Name: EcommerceDetailScript.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Paste the tracking code generated by Google analytics here. {ORDERID}, {PRODUCTSKU}, {PRODUCTNAME}, {CATEGORYNAME}, {UNITPRICE}, {QUANTITY} will be dynamically replaced.
